meanings.definition: A person who is considered to be eccentric or insane.
meanings.sent1: The crackbrain in our neighborhood always wears mismatched socks.
meanings.sent2: The teacher thought the crackbrain's idea of building a rocket out of cardboard was creative.
meanings.sent3: The crackbrain insisted on wearing a winter coat in the middle of summer.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a crackbrain, full of wild and unpredictable thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The crackbrain's laughter echoed through the empty halls, drawing curious glances.

meanings.definition: To crack or break open the skull.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally crackbrained the coconut while trying to open it with a hammer.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist carefully crackbrained the ancient skull to study its structure.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef managed to crackbrain several eggs while preparing breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The earthquake seemed to crackbrain the very foundation of the old building.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise made her feel like someone had crackbrained her head with a hammer.
